task_description: Deploy danieltarazona.com portfolio website to Cloudflare Pages and configure DNS routing through Cloudflare DNS (domain registered at Namecheap)

patterns.deployment_pattern: GitHub Actions deploys to Cloudflare Pages using cloudflare/wrangler-action@v3
patterns.build_pattern: npm ci -> npm run build -> deploy dist/ directory
patterns.project_structure: Astro static site with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS
patterns.dns_pattern: Cloudflare DNS with proxied records (orange cloud) for CDN and SSL

existing_implementations.description: Deployment infrastructure already exists and is configured

findings.github_workflow: Fully configured GitHub Actions workflow for Cloudflare Pages deployment
